rules_text:
Multikicker {E}{E} [i](You may pay an additional {E}{E} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Tressera enters, create a 1/1 colorless Forest Dryad land creature token for each time Tressera was kicked.
{T}: You get {E}. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Dryad you control.
notes:
!addtoken Forest Dryad; Energy Reserve;
!token Forest Dryad VRN; Energy Reserve VRN;
